author: Luis A. Cruz
subject: Guess what was in my mailbox...
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

After an exhausting day at work, I came home
to find a pleasant surprise in my mailbox.
The Toon Magazine containing the Lupin article!
I sent the check to them over 2 or 3 months ago
and had given up on seeing it ever, but it finally
arrived!

It is an excellent article containing detailed synopses
for the 1st and 2nd tv series.  Another interesting thing
it noted is that Fuma Conspiracy was an OVA at first but
was eventually shown in theaters anyway.

I highly recommend picking this issue up; the article
was compiled from various TMS articles and press.
Go to http://www.toonmagazine.com/ to find out how to
get your copy; just be prepared for a long wait! :)

On a different note, I am in the process of reworking
the Lupin FAQ.  Should be up sometime next week.  Hope
someone is happy about this besides me. :)

- ---
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/
Anime Video Game Resource Center: 
http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/avrc/
